poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Give him an inch and he'll take an ounce.
Give him a twelfth and he'll take a month.
Give him a break and he'll take
Inchmurrin on the Highland Boundary Fault,
An open slide-rule,
For Jean-Jacques Rousseau on the Ile St. Pierre,
Avoiding guests and tourists
In its paleoromantic
Priory.
